external_games.name: Haunted Hospital Asylum Escape: Hidden Objects

name: Haunted Hospital Asylum Escape: Hidden Objects
summary: Experience the dread of the haunted hospital! Enter the demolished asylum and look for the hidden objects scattered all over the place. Watch out, anything can be found in the hospital room of terror! If horror in the hospital is what you're looking for, and if you're good at escape the hospital games, you're at the right place!
